product_name: MatrixA Curl Can Dream Moisturizing Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingMatrix A Curl Can Dream Moisturizing Cream is for curls and coils and infused with Manuka honey extract. This leave-in cream provides moisture and definition without flaking or crunch, and protects from heat styling.
details: DetailsBenefitsFor curls and coilsLeave-in cream provides moisture and definitionNo flaking or crunchProtects from heat styling up to 450 degreesKey IngredientsManuka honey extractFormulated WithoutSiliconesSulfatesParabensMineral OilPetrolatumParaffinsItem 2586593How To UseAfter using Shampoo or Co-Wash and Mask, apply desired amount of product depending on curl density (less for fine hair and more for thick hair). Apply to soaking wet hair from root to tip, sectioning off as you go. Scrunch curls and follow with Light Hold Gel for definition, and Lightweight Oil for added shine. Allow to air dry or diffuse.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Behentrimonium Chloride, Persea Gratissima Oil / Avocado Oil, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Tocopheryl Acetate, Camelina Sativa Seed Oil, Phenoxyethanol, Cetyl Esters, Parfum / Fragrance, Sodium Bicarbonate, Isopropyl Alcohol, Polyquaternium-4, Pectin, Sucrose, Linalool, Citronellol, Mel Extract / Honey Extract, Geraniol, Benzyl Salicylate, Benzyl Alcohol, Citral, Tocopherol, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil / Sunflower Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract / Rosemary Leaf Extract, Citric Acid (F.I.L. C255719/1).
how_to_use: After using Shampoo or Co-Wash and Mask, apply desired amount of product depending on curl density (less for fine hair and more for thick hair). Apply to soaking wet hair from root to tip, sectioning off as you go. Scrunch curls and follow with Light Hold Gel for definition, and Lightweight Oil for added shine. Allow to air dry or diffuse.
ingredients: Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil / Sunflower Seed Oil
Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract / Rosemary Leaf Extract

reviews.headline: Has been my go to for a few years now
reviews.comments: I got a few jars of this product and the co wash from Essence festival and I have been using it for my twist outs for the past 2 years. I will say it does not mix with gel well but it holds a curl well on its own. I couple it with blue magic

reviews.headline: Great product for curls
reviews.comments: Very moisturerizing will definitely purchase again.

reviews.headline: Wow
reviews.comments: Typically I use multiple products to achieve the curl definition i seek. However, when i use this product, its a one and done!

reviews.headline: really works
reviews.comments: I hate crunchy curls products and this is not one. it's great. adds volume. fluffy curls. it will last me forever. huge jar of product. great value. will buy again if I ever finish this jar.

reviews.headline: My go to
reviews.comments: Love this cream. It does not weigh my hair down & helps with the frizz.

reviews.headline: love love love
reviews.comments: why is this product not marketed ?   It is the best!!!

reviews.headline: Good Moisturizing Cream
reviews.comments: I have 2b/2c hair and struggle with dryness 2nd day after washing. I appreciate that this product has pretty much eliminated that problem for me. My hair is really thin due to thyroid issues/pcos/androgenic alopecia. It does give a little curl definition in my case, but it isn't strong enough to keep my curls going for days. That's okay though because I feel like its purpose is to be a leave in conditioner that doesn't weigh down curls, preps them for follow up products, and protects from heat. I follow up with a mousse and diffuse and it keeps my curls moisturized until my next wash (I wash every 3 days). I own a lot of prestige brand leave-in conditioners that haven't been that great for my curls nor dryness and will be happy to throw them all away and replace with this product.

reviews.headline: Best curl cream
reviews.comments: I use this for my daughter with very curly hair as part of her hair routine. Smells amazing compared to many other curl creams and works amazing. I'm always getting questions on the products o use for her hair. Will purchase again and again .

reviews.headline: Great product but Smells Weird
reviews.comments: This is a great product fof low porosity hair, but the smell is not pleasant. I would buy tubs of this but the scent isn't flattering.

reviews.headline: Weighs hair down
reviews.comments: I really wanted to like this product since it smells good and gives me good defintion but it seems like no matter how much or less of product I put in my hair it just doesnt last! I always use a gel to help with hold and help my defintion last longer but theres something in this product that just wont let the different types of gels I've used form a cast. So with or without gel my hair starts to lose definition the next day, and starts to feel heavy (which never happens with the other types of curl creams I use since I have thicker hair) Personally I won't be using this again since to me it doesn't seem to be worth it unless you just want to wear your hair natural for just a day.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: This product makes my super curly hair manageable Soft and Smells terrific Just read directions and enjoy

reviews.headline: Sooooo GOOD!
reviews.comments: I have 2a/2b waves. This cream creates such lush, full, wave/curl definition. I air dry and sleep with a pineapple bun and the waves last for 3 days. I love this cream!

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: I have thick 3c/4a hair and I wear my hair in a braid out 90% of the time. This product right here keeps my braid out fresh for days. With other products I have to rebraid my hair every few days but not with this.

reviews.headline: Best curl cream ever
reviews.comments: This is my favorite curl cream ever. It makes my curls kinky. Only a little goes a long way. I also use either a moose or light gel prior to applying the cream. I did notice if you only use this product Ivy itself it did dry out my hair. Ever since I started using it with the moose it helped. Will continue using this as long as Matrix has it.

reviews.headline: Did not work for me
reviews.comments: I have 3b hair, it was extremely hard to comb through it after.  Did not like this product, there's one ive used for two years and you can comb through it had a lot of slip.

reviews.headline: Moisture
reviews.comments: Not meant for my type c hair. It dries it out, there's no shine. It may work for you, just not for me.

reviews.headline: Love this moisturizer
reviews.comments: Makes my hair soft, keeps it moisturized and smells great.

reviews.headline: It's pretty good
reviews.comments: Its a good curl cream. Its a very generous sized container which when yoyre heavy handed like me is always a good thing. I can see how the scent may be overwhelming for someone who is sensitive to smells because ot is a very heavy smell. I think the hold is fine flaking is very minimal if i flake at all. I have 3C/4A type curls and it left them all super defined.

reviews.headline: a little goes a long way
reviews.comments: The first time I used this product I did not like it. I applied a generous amount from root to ems and it weighted down my curls. The second time I used it I used a small amount from mid length to end and it  was amazing. My curls are so defined and almost frizz free. When using this product less is definitely more!

reviews.headline: Loveeee
reviews.comments: Love it!

faceoff_positive.comments: Products caught my eye during the hair sale event .Trust and believe when I tell you, I am always trying different brands and looking for what's on sale. This caught my eye is it was on sale the last day of the sale so I decided to buy the whole system I actually To be honest didn't know if this was better for Caucasian hair or African-American hair nevertheless I looked at the pictures on the ad and the girls kind of had hair like mine so I went for it .I kind of set on my dresser for a while as I told myself I was going to "save it ""For the next time I had my hair done at the salon nevertheless I did not wait and try it boy am I glad I did! I do believe you must use every piece of the system normally I do not do that with it being on sale I was able to afford it I don't know if I would buy it honestly I don't know if I Would buy it if it weren't on some kind of sale. If you use the system like it said and believe me I am a paying customer I am not doing this for free products for reviews. It does not leave your hair crunchy does not leave it flaky and it does keep your hair curly for days it actually looked better the second day as long as I reread it you must Follow the instructions exactly! Do n hesitate my hair is a little on the thick side I just have a lot of hair I am 25% Greek 25% Puerto Rican 25% German and 25% French I would be considered Caucasian of course so to let you know what kind of hair I have it does work I let it air dry it is beautiful go for it you won't be disappointed the only thing that I do not like is the scent it's not bad it's just so strong! But obviously that doesn't stand in the way of the performance.
faceoff_positive.headline: Finally a review you can TRUST!(as I paid for ALL5 products)

faceoff_negative.comments:
After eagerly trying out the Matrix A curl can Dream Cream , I am left with mixed feelings about its performance. While it certainly had a pleasant fragrance, I can't help but feel underwhelmed by its overall effectiveness.

Let's start with the positive aspect‚Äîthe scent. The hair cream boasted a delightful fragrance that initially drew me in. Applying it was a pleasant experience, and the aroma lingered on my hair throughout the day. It's evident that some thought went into crafting an appealing scent, which is commendable.

However, beyond its pleasant smell, the curl did not dream. The biggest drawback I encountered was its excessively watery consistency. Upon opening the container, I was surprised by how runny the product was, making it challenging to apply. The cream dripped through my fingers, leading to an unnecessary mess during the application process. This thin texture didn't do justice to my hair, and I felt like I needed to use more product than usual to get any noticeable effect. It may have been my hair type but I personally would not recommend.
faceoff_negative.headline: Ehhn..not impressed.

rollup.name: A Curl Can Dream Moisturizing Cream
